attributes.review: Absolutely terrible app. Made my phone glitch and freeze all the time. The app itself would crash almost every time I opened it. Probably comes from all the racism but anyways. Horrible terrible app.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I opened the app and it was complete garbage. I put in all my personal information, and now I’m getting telemarketer calls. It is filled with the fake BS that trump wants you to see and I’m tired of it. Go crawl out of the little dirty hole that you came out of you orange faced liar.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: I hope that you don’t download this app 😤I       Would      NEVER     DOWNLOAD    THIS  APP if I was you .dont waste your storage on this horrible app. .......I’m don’t even want to give it one star because this app does not deserve it I NEVER I MEAN NEVER want to see this app again.i think I’m Done now
attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE 🤮

attributes.review: I wasn't expecting much from this app to begin with but the level of just unfunctionaly was astromonical. Pure and utter garbage. This was a waste of a minute in my life. I hope no one has to go through what I have. Mister Donald Trump, truly is a 🤡. That is all💅🧚💕✨
attributes.title: Dissapointed and dissatisfied

attributes.review: When I opened the app it crashed my phone. Yes I am 18 years of age and willing to vote. I also downloaded the app to see why I should vote for trump. Probably worst app ever because it took 10 minutes to recover from the crash.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: It took hours to download and I have good internet and when I open it just last a few second and closed again 🙁 I just wanted to see the good job president orange was doing on making America racist again 😢
attributes.title: So bad 🤦🏽‍♀️

attributes.review: This is the worse app ever I tried to download this to find another reason vote Trump again but no. This app took around 5 minutes with perfectly fine internet at this point I have no hope for America.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I was waiting a couple weeks to get it and it took FOREVER to download. As well as playing some music that attracted bugs. I can’t believe this app really made my home beg infested. This app is stupid and nonetheless awful. DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP! give it a 1 star rate as well.
attributes.title: stupid app

attributes.review: Super low quality and laggy and my phone is super good and it’s making it overheat this is a waste of time to download and it’s just a bad app that should be deleted and it just the worse app I’ve ever seen 🤬🤬🤬🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤢
attributes.title: Laggy! And low quality

attributes.review: Trump is literally the worst thing that happened to America after slavery. This man is a liar, crook, children’ lover, predator. I am just baffled he was able to stay in office this long. If you have an ounce of sense in you, you know what to do in November.
attributes.title: Is it even a thing ?
